text: Henry James Nowak (February 21, 1935 - July 21, 2024) was an American politician and lawyer. Nowak was born in Buffalo, New York. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Nowak was a member of the United States House of Representatives from New York between 1975 until 1993. Nowak died on July 21, 2024 in Pompano Beach, Florida at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Lawyers from Buffalo, New York Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from Buffalo, New York Category:Politicians from Buffalo, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Henry J. Nowak
